title: Running in docker
description: Workflow for running projects in docker, i.e. isolated environment - all being contained in scripts/docker

features.title: Docker workflow - use the `create_feature` tool to create atomic features for this task
features.description: adhere to `docs/PROJECTS_GUIDE.md` to create all needed features for any project to be able to run in docker. It must be possible to do this with a minimal amount of steps and configuration. As much as possible should be configured for the user - if possible any data already present in THIS project should be reused.
